label: Udio by Muse Group
description: Lets creators share audio (music, podcasts) and collaborate for free.

label: Suno by Suno, Inc.
description: An AI music creation tool that generates songs based on user-provided lyrics and genre preferences.

label: MusicFX by Google
description: MusicFX is an experimental technology that allows you to generate your own music.

label: MusicFX DJ by Google
description: MusicFX DJ lets you input multiple prompts to shape the music in real-time and create an evolving soundscape.

label: AI Music Generator by Brev AI
description: Create high-quality music in seconds with Brev.ai for your videos,social media, and more.

label: Soundraw by SOUNDRAW Inc.
description: Lets you create custom royalty-free music with AI

label: Music generator by Robin Thorsen
description: Create catchy, genre-specific songs instantly, complete with verses, choruses, and melody suggestions.

label: Song Identifier
description: Find that song in your head with the help of AI

label: SONOTELLER
description: SONOTELLER listens to music and creates a comprehensive summary about the song.
